ygData.subject: Vampiza vs. Windlord?
ygData.msgSnippet: Since windlord didnt say anything confusing this time, Vampiza was ready for the attack. Unlike the past two volleys, this volley of shots was dodged as

Subject: Vampiza vs. Windlord?
Message-ID: <9jccr6+bsp8@...>

User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 495
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

Since windlord didnt say anything confusing this time, Vampiza was 
ready for the attack. Unlike the past two volleys, this volley of 
shots was dodged as Vampiza barrel rolled to the right. He then 
returned fire with two beams of Chaochitan energy.

Meanwhile... back at the second infecticon base, Blight smirked as he 
atched Alecto become surrounded and submerged by the ocean. He then 
pressed a button to bring the bases exterior defenses online.

Blight: "Time to have some real fun..."
